thread.title: Taupo man killed by car reversing out of driveway
thread.title_full: Taupo man killed by car reversing out of driveway

title: Taupo man killed by car reversing out of driveway
text:
Taupo man killed by car reversing out of driveway Last updated 10:02, February 14 2017 MAARTEN HOLL/FAIRFAX NZ 
Police say Taupo man David Paramena Mitchell was struck and killed by a car reversing out of a driveway. 
A man who was struck and killed by a car reversing out of a driveway has been named. 
He was David Paramena Mitchell, a 53-year-old Taupo resident. 
Police were called to the incident at a Taupo home in the early hours of Saturday. 
"This is another tragic loss of life from a driveway incident," Senior Sergeant Fane Troy said in a statement. 
"It is a timely reminder to take care in and around driveways, and it shows that young children are not the only ones vulnerable to these types of incidents. 
"Police therefore encourage drivers to ensure that driveways are clear of all people when moving vehicles." 
The Serious Crash Unit is investigating.
